item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepSeek: X2 Speed for WASM with SIMD (300 points | 144 comments)
2. Maxima in the browser using Embedded Common Lisp on WASM (53 points | 8 comments)
3. IAC confirms existence of a Super-earth in the habitable zone of a Sun-like Star (72 points | 53 comments)
4. Bitwarden introduces mandatory 2FA for new devices (56 points | 49 comments)
5. We're bringing Pebble back (2391 points | 605 comments)
6. Curo (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Qwen2.5-Max: Exploring the Intelligence of Large-Scale Moe Model (21 points | 2 comments)
8. Run DeepSeek R1 Dynamic 1.58-bit (548 points | 229 comments)
9. XB-1 First Supersonic Flight [video] (49 points | 27 comments)
10. Public Access OpenVMS System (34 points | 21 comments)
11. Janus Pro 1B running 100% locally in-browser on WebGPU (100 points | 11 comments)
12. Machine Learning in Production (CMU Course) (401 points | 29 comments)
13. Fixing my monitor's power button (27 points | 8 comments)
14. FTC Takes Action Against GoDaddy for Alleged Lax Data Security (91 points | 44 comments)
15. Show HN: Design/build of some elegant parametric speaker cabinets with OpenSCAD (17 points | 8 comments)
16. HawkEye: A Simple license header checker and formatter in Rust (16 points | discuss)
17. Beautiful Free Math – Desmos Animated Graphing Calculator (89 points | 15 comments)
18. Watch the path of a raindrop from anywhere in the world (8 points | 1 comment)
19. Sam Altman said startups with $10M were 'hopeless' competing with OpenAI (5 points | 1 comment)
20. Almost one in 10 people use the same four-digit PIN (101 points | 84 comments)
21. Turning the database inside-out (2015) (152 points | 71 comments)
22. IOC long shot Watanabe hopes 'crazy' Olympic idea sparks debate (32 points | 30 comments)
23. BrainFlood: Runtime code generation via reflection in .NET (43 points | 14 comments)
24. Stable Flow: Vital Layers for Training-Free Image Editing (4 points | discuss)
25. The Alpha Myth: How captive wolves led us astray (331 points | 288 comments)
26. Show HN: Vole Machine ISA Simulator (9 points | 1 comment)
27. How we scaled Slack to support 1000s of developers (160 points | 94 comments)
28. The Taylorator – All Your Frequencies Are Belong to Us (310 points | 93 comments)
29. Go 1.24's go tool is one of the best additions to the ecosystem in years (261 points | 149 comments)
30. Show HN: Browse Anime from the Terminal (47 points | 22 comments)
